ai-tha-ap74:1.2_0: of seeing the Kinsman of the Sun,
ai-tha-ap74:1.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap74:2.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap74:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap74:2.4_0: this fruit is the perception of giving.
ai-tha-ap74:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Scripture.
ai-tha-ap74:6.1_0: The second (which) fell into the Elder’s presence,
